strings:
<voice_0x010010E1><se_def>Cash: Our foster father has passed away.
Now we're in the middle of deciding which
of us will take control of his fortune.

<voice_0x010010E2><se_def>Cash: Maybe ‘arguing’ is a better term.
My sister and I are like oil and water.
We never agree on anything.

<voice_0x010010E3><se_high>Carrie: That's why we've decided to have a trial.
A contest, basically.
<voice_0x010010E4><se_high>Carrie: Whoever completes it and returns to town first will be declared the winner.

<voice_0x010010E5><se_def>Cash: The trial itself is a Golding family tradition.
It's like a test of a potential heir's worthiness.
<voice_0x010010E6><se_def>Cash: All one has to do is enter the Dragon Graveyard and obtain the mark of the family on their hands. Sounds easy, right?
<voice_0x010010E7><se_high>Carrie: Not! The Dragon Graveyard is full of monsters! We could even die, you know? So we've agreed to hire bodyguards to protect us during the competition.

<voice_0x010010E8><se_def>Cash: The only thing is, we haven't been able to
find bodyguards of the right calibre.

<voice_0x010010E9><se_def>Cash: But I've got a good feeling about you travellers.
What do you say, little sister?

<voice_0x010010EA><se_high>Carrie: I hate to say it, but I agree.
Wow, this is a first.

<voice_0x010010EB><se_def>Cash: Well, there you have it. Okay then.
If we're all in agreement, why don't you
go ahead and choose which of our backs
you'd like to cover?
<voice_0x010010EC><se_def>Cash: The loser will use bodyguards picked from the mansion staff. Won't you, Carrie?

<voice_0x010010ED><se_high>Carrie: Whatever.
You're going down either way, Cash.

<voice_0x010010EF><se_def>Cash: Oh, and one more thing.
You'll be compensated regardless of who wins.
So don't worry about pay.
